alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 11 at 2:01PM MDT until September 12 at 4:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...East winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, especially below canyons east of the Rio Grande. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways, including portions of I-25.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
